overview: Who is Merilyn Sakova? Who is the girl behind the G-cup bra? Go with SCORE studio to Kiev in the Ukraine, Merilyn's home. We lived with Merilyn for a week and brought back all of this sexy girl's hot secrets. For the first time ever, a reality DVD that sexposes every inch. It's Merilyn In Yer Face!
title: Merilyn In Yer Face!
